sn22.35:1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.35:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu;
sn22.35:1.4: yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho, appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.35:1.5: “Yaṃ kho, bhikkhu, anuseti, tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati;
sn22.35:1.6: yaṃ nānuseti, na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti.
sn22.35:2.1: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.35:2.5: Saṅkhāre ce anuseti tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.35:2.7: Rūpañce, bhante, nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.35:2.11: viññāṇañce nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.35:2.12: Imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.35:3.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsi.
sn22.35:3.3: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, anuseti tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.35:3.8: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.35:3.12: viññāṇañce nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.35:3.13: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena, bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
sn22.35:4.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn22.35:5.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn22.35:5.2: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn22.35:5.3: Aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṃ ahosīti.
